name: Youth for Single Room Occupancy
description: Youth for Single Room Occupancy (YSRO) is a CCDC youth leadership development program that empowers youth to lead intergenerational community service activities with seniors living in Chinatown's single-room occupancy units.
fullDescription: Youth for Single Room Occupancy (YSRO) is a CCDC youth leadership development program that empowers youth to lead intergenerational community service activities with seniors living in Chinatown's single-room occupancy units.
whatTheyOffer: Youth for Single Room Occupancy (YSRO) is a CCDC youth leadership development program that empowers youth to lead intergenerational community service activities with seniors living in Chinatown's single-room occupancy units.
howToGetIt: If interested, please email ccdcyouthsf@gmail.com or fill out this form: https://forms.gle/W8Ey2SFWnVxKYfSeA
